summary: Collection of documents regarding CIA's position on releasing information pertaining to Mexico City Station and the JFK Assassination Records. Also includes notes from meetings with ARRB staff and correspondence regarding the release of various CIA stations.
title: Position on Release of Information Pertaining to Mexico City Station and the JFK Assassination Records
recipient: Chief, Historical Review Group/Director, Intelligence Coordination, Intelligence and Research, Department of State/J. Barry Harrelson/Fredrick Wickham/Johnny Goins/Eleanor E. Neiman
sender: Fredrick C. Wickham, Jr./David N. Edger/Linda C. Cipriani/J. Barry Harrelson/David Cohen
